data.name: MAL back to old "small" icons for cast&crew
data.description: A few days ago MAL changed the size of images for cast, crew, characters and other things. Not everyone likes this change. Want to go back to the smaller images? This script is for you!

data.name: rarbg - dark fb
data.description: dark style for rarbg. real clean. i use this in addition to my userscript at https://greasyfork.org/en/scripts/370681-rarbg-improved the script just puts cursor focus on search input box, changes category links to sort by seeders, and searches for 1080 in applicable categories
